Demonstrations Listed by Top-Level Domain

See the quick tour for a smaller set of demos that highlight the key features of Ptolemy II.

Ptolemy II Domains

  • CSP (Communicating Sequential Processes)
  • CT (Continuous Time)
  • DE (Discrete Events)
  • FSM (Finite State Machines)
  • PN (Process Networks)
  • Rendezvous (Processes with synchronous communication)
  • SDF (Synchronous Dataflow)

Communicating Sequential Processes (CSP)

  • Barrier Synchronization (New in Ptolemy II 6.0)
  • Resource Management (New in Ptolemy II 6.0)
  • Write Regulator (New in Ptolemy II 6.0)

Continuous Time (CT)

  • Brownian
  • Poisson
  • Sampled Clocks
  • Satellite
  • Ball Bounncing on a Sinusoidal Surface (New in Ptolemy II 6.)
  • Square Wave Response
  • Static Units
  • Sticky Point Masses
  • Sticky Point Masses Modified Version
  • Switching Continuous Signals using Modal Models
  • Thermostat
  • Transmission
  • Triggered Continuous Clock
  • Units
  • Vehicle 2 Vehicle

Discrete Events (DE)

  • Inspection Paradox
  • Long Runs
  • Modal Model
  • Queue and Server (M/M/1 Queues) (New in Ptolemy II 6.0)
  • Router
  • Smart Sender
  • Timing Paradox
  • Variable Delay

Finite State Machine (FSM)

  • Alternating Bit
  • Chained Transitions
  • Blending (with codegen)
  • Modal Binary Symmetric Channel (with codegen)
  • State Tracker

Process Networks (PN)
  • Brock-Ackerman Anomaly
  • Nondeterministic Merge
  • Ordered Merge
  • Remove Nil Tokens (New in Ptolemy II 6.0)
  • QR

Rendezvous

  • Barrier Synchronization (New in Ptolemy II 6.0)
  • Resource Management (New in Ptolemy II 6.0)
  • Sequencing (New in Ptolemy II 6.0)
  • Write Regulator (New in Ptolemy II 6.0)

Synchronous Dataflow (SDF)

  • Animate Vergil
  • Array
  • ApplyFFT
  • Butterfly (with codegen)
  • Case (New in Ptolemy II 6.0) (with codegen)
  • ColtRandom
  • Communications demos: ConvolutionalCoder, Scrambler, TrellisDecoder, ViterbiDecoder
  • DFT Subset
  • Expression
  • Expression
  • Eye Diagram
  • Fixed-Point FIR Filter
  • Fixed-Point Arithmetic
  • Fourier Series
  • Karplus-Strong Sound Synthesis
  • LMS Adaptive Filter
  • Multiple Runs
  • NoisySinewave
  • Maximum Entropy Spectrum
  • Matlab in SDF Windows only, requires that Matlab be installed locally
  • Network Integration
  • Ptolemnizer (using Python)
  • Python Integration
  • Rijndael Encryption
  • Sketched Signal
  • Slider Parameter and Port Parameters
  • Spectrum
  • Sound Spectrum
  • SynthesizedVoice
